A gun sight with Burnice from zzz.
*Note: there are a few lines that won't show in game(I've made too many), but they won't affect at all the drawing, it will look like in the 3rd photo

...And Justice for All.

No. 20
Description: The reticle of the PK-A Scope found on Battlefield 4, made for suitable use as a tank gunsight.

Bonus drawing: Album cover of Metallica's "...And Justice For All" (DARKNESS, IMPRISONING ME)

Best used: Universally. Sight choices have one with ballistics and without ballistics to accommodate low tier and top tier combat.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the README folder.

#wtdraw #universal #sight #sights #a...

Trust me, It's milk.
Leave me a like

#anime #wtdraw

Hi! My name is!

No. 19
Description: A Usersight based on the Trijicon VCOG 6x reticle. Looks and feels familiar to my earlier ACOG sights because they're made by the same company!

Bonus drawing: Album cover of the single; "My Name Is" - Eminem (CHKA-CHKA!)

Best used: for tanks with moderate-high velocity rounds like mid tier APHE and top tier APFSDS, not recommended for very low velocity tank guns.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the README folder.
</b...

Guess Who's Back.

No. 18
Description: A rudimentary sight based on the 1.6x scope of the FN F2000 includes both a clean and a ballistic version.

Bonus drawing: Eminem - Without Me (BACK AGAIN 😎😎😎)

Best used: Universally; options for low tier and top tier tanks are present.

WTDraw files present inside for the album cover. More instructions available on the README folder.

#wtdraw #universal #sight #sights #alltanks #all_tanks #mbt #lowtier #toptier #eminem #guesswhosback
